arm_group.description: Participants will undergo four weeks (in a randomized order) of receiving personalized motivational text-messages while receiving CBT for their eating disorder.
Participants will receive 4 randomized weeks of not receiving text messages while receiving CBT for their eating disorder.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study is to pilot an innovative motivational text-message intervention for
      individuals with anorexia nervosa and subthreshold anorexia nervosa. Patients will receive
      personalized motivational text-messages as an adjunct to cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT).
       CBT will be provided to patients at no cost for the duration of the study. The
      investigators hypothesize that the text-messages will help increase motivation to change and
      kilocalorie intake and decrease eating disordered behavior.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Novel Motivational Ecological Momentary Intervention for Anorexia Nervosa

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Anorexia nervosa/subthreshold anorexia nervosa (i.e., individuals who exhibit
             significant dietary restraint)

          -  18+ years old

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  BMI < 16.5

          -  Medication instability for 6 weeks

          -  Recent/current suicidal risk

          -  Comorbid substance abuse or dependence, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, or mental
             retardation

          -  Inability to provide release of information to a medical provider

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Motivation to Change Eating Disorder Behaviors
Kilocalorie Intake (measured by self-report food records)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Feasibility measured by compliance with daily questionnaire

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
